body:
Comment 5: 
I agree about crypto/x509 in theory, but since it's X.509 I'm willing to let it slide,
especially at this point, and especially if agl wants to leave it as is.

go1.3.html should mention that big.Int and big.Rat now implement encoding.TextMarshaler
and encoding.TextUnmarshaler.

I want to take a closer look at regexp/syntax.

I'm happy with everything else.
